title: One For All In Game Freeze
body: Me and some friends were playing some One For All.  The Game was Hecarims vs. Shacos.  We were towards the end of the game and out of nowhere the game just froze.  I and the other people that I was with all restarted the client several times and tried to reconnect but it won't let us back into the game or it won't let us do anything.  PLEASE RIOT HELP US ALL!!!!!!

replies.body:
Since it was a group issue you may have to send in a ticket to them so they are able to look into it further for you. Here's the link that will get you the ticket: http://riot.com/1w3GsqG When writing in the ticket you may want to include your logs as well. Trust me, been there before, but don't post them here xD https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs

Those two should send you on the right track to get the help that you need :D {{champion:25}} {{summoner:6}} {{item:1026}}
